item.title: Airtable Expense Logging with Ledger Mode
item.description: Sometimes, we want to post individual ledger postings to some external API. In this article, we explore ledger-mode’s source and figure out how to prepare the data for uploading to Airtable, a general-purpose user-friendly database.
